page.title: 16Derwentside Festival.
page.content: {The Derwentside Festival}took place in a series of venues during the week 22nd-29th. June'85.The first of what is hoped to be an{annual event,}the festival was the idea of Mr. Brian Lee who became chairman of a ten strong organising committee. The main elements of the Festival were: live shows at the Empire Theatre;(featuring folk, fiddle, pipe and dance music) open air events in Middle St;(again various musical events). Parade of floats on the final Saturday. Sports day involving local schools and other organisations (athletics, karate, archery). Day show , B.M.X. display, Jazz Band contest. About 500 people attended the theatre, approximately 3000 attended the final few days events at{Bell Vue playing fields and 200 attended the final dance.
